Name: Grilled Lemon Chicken
Description: Tender chicken breasts marinated in lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil, then grilled to perfection.

Name: Honey Garlic Chicken Thighs
Description: Juicy chicken thighs glazed with a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce.

Name: Spicy Buffalo Chicken Wings
Description: Crispy fried chicken wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce, served with blue cheese dressing.

Name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
Description: Creamy fettuccine pasta served with grilled chicken, smothered in a rich Alfredo sauce.

Name: Chicken Caesar Salad
Description: Grilled chicken strips served on a bed of fresh romaine lettuce, tossed with Caesar dressing and topped with croutons.

Name: Chicken Parmesan
Description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

Name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
Description: Thin-crust pizza topped with BBQ chicken, red onions, and cilantro on a tangy BBQ sauce base.
